thread.title: I’m a doctor all over again: Shah Rukh Khan
thread.title_full: I’m a doctor all over again: Shah Rukh Khan

author: Deccan
title: I’m a doctor all over again: Shah Rukh Khan
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 15, 2015, 20.14 pm Mumbai: One of Britain’s most hallowed schools of learning – the University of Edinburgh has honoured Bollywood’s King Khan with doctorate.
SRK received the doctorate today at the Edinburgh University, where he also delivered a lecture on life lessons. The actor feels honoured to have received the doctor title all over again. The star took to his official Twitter account to thank Her Royal Highness and others for the Degree of Doctor Honoris Causa.
“Her Royal Highness & Prof. Jeffery & Smith & all ur colleagues thank u for the Degree of Doctor Honoris Causa,” SRK tweeted.
Her Royal Highness & Prof. Jeffery & Smith & all ur colleagues thank u for the Degree of Doctor Honoris Causa. pic.twitter.com/tCJKU61mzf
— Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) October 15, 2015 The star couldn’t hide his excitement and shared his joy with his fans by tweeting,
I am a Doctor all over again…yay!! pic.twitter.com/jKoDnDAhw8
— Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) October 15, 2015 The actor previously received an honorary doctorate degree in arts and culture from Britain's University of Bedfordshire.
Tags: entertainment Bollywood Shah Rukh Khan Also Read Ranbir Kapoor gets Anurag Kashyap to lose 15 kgs Karan Patel sports new look in 'Yeh Hai Mohabbatein' Sholay released in Pakistan Focus shifts on Mahesh Babu
